snippet.title: Card Thief Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Card Thief is a solitaire style stealth game played with a deck of cards.
Available on the App Store - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/card-thief/id1186226470
Get it on Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tinytouchtales.cardthief

http://www.card-thief.com
